headline.main: 2 Dead After Boat Capsizes in Jamaica Bay

byline.original: By LIAM STACK and BENJAMIN MUELLER

snippet: Two others were injured when the pleasure boat they were in capsized in choppy waters on Friday night near Floyd Bennett Field, the authorities said.
lead_paragraph: Two others were injured when the pleasure boat they were in capsized in choppy waters on Friday night near Floyd Bennett Field, the authorities said.
